quoteData.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done
quoteData.name: Nelson Mandela

quoteData.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best
quoteData.name: St. Jerome

quoteData.quote: Let there be work, bread, water and salt for all
quoteData.name: Nelson Mandela

quoteData.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world
quoteData.name: Nelson Mandela

quoteData.quote: You don’t have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you
quoteData.name: Dan Millman

quoteData.quote: There is a crack in everything, that’s how the light gets in
quoteData.name: Leonard Cohen

quoteData.quote: It is not the bruises on the body that hurt. It is the wounds of the heart and the scars on the mind
quoteData.name: Aisha Mirza

quoteData.quote: Not until we are lost do we begin to understand ourselves
quoteData.name: Henry David Thoreau

quoteData.quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light
quoteData.name: Albus Dumbledore

quoteData.quote: Just because you don’t understand it doesn’t mean it isn’t so
quoteData.name: Lemony Snicket

quoteData.quote: Just because no one else can heal or do your inner work for you doesn’t mean you can, should, or need to do it alone
quoteData.name: Lisa Olivera

quoteData.quote: There is hope, even when your brain tells you there isn’t
quoteData.name: John Green

quoteData.quote: Self-care is how you take your power back
quoteData.name: Lalah Delia

quoteData.quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection
quoteData.name: Buddha

quoteData.quote: The best way out is always through
quoteData.name: Robert Frost

quoteData.quote: We are not our trauma. We are not our brain chemistry. That’s part of who we are, but we’re so much more than that
quoteData.name: Sam J. Miller

quoteData.quote: Your mental health is everything – prioritize it. Make the time like your life depends on it, because it does
quoteData.name: Mel Robbins

quoteData.quote: What mental health needs is more sunlight, more candor, and more unashamed conversation
quoteData.name: Glenn Close

quoteData.quote: Being able to be your true self is one of the strongest components of good mental health
quoteData.name: Dr. Lauren Fogel Mersy

quoteData.quote: Don’t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant
quoteData.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quoteData.quote: Sometimes the people around you won’t understand your journey. They don’t need to, it’s not for them
quoteData.name: Joubert Botha

quoteData.quote: I am not afraid of storms for I am learning how to sail my ship
quoteData.name: Louisa May Alcott

quoteData.quote: You are valuable just because you exist. Not because of what you do or what you have done, but simply because you are
quoteData.name: Max Lucado

quoteData.quote: Even if we don’t have the power to choose where we come from, we can still choose where we go from there
quoteData.name: Stephen Chbosky

quoteData.quote: This feeling will pass. The fear is real but the danger is not
quoteData.name: Cammie McGovern
